Params: {3: 'The severe winter in the far north approaches on the edge of the night sky, but the snowflakes have yet to arrive.'}
{3: 'Tonight will usher in Christmas Eve. Everyone who has just completed the recon mission waits in anticipation...'}
{3: 'Everyone in Gray Raven is looking to enjoy the festivity in the air.'}
{3: 'They also hope that everything in the plan can go smoothly.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, may I take a moment of your time? There is something I want to discuss with you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But everyone has been... acting weird toward me recently...', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's the sound of the encrypted comm link.", 3: '20', 4: 'One second. I need to step away for a moment.', 5: '20'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Someone needs to talk with you? Is it Liv...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...The plan was for you to take the initiative and find her. The next step is the most crucial part.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Plan B, Commandant. Take Liv to the target location to begin the first phase.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It seems like everyone is avoiding me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What makes you say that?', 3: '36', 4: 'You must be mistaken...', 5: '36'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Lucia's been running around a lot recently. I tried saying hi to her several times, but she ran away like she was avoiding me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Lee did the same thing. Whenever I used to go to Lee to repair my attachments, he'd always patiently share all kinds of ways to help maintain my equipment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But recently, he's always saying he's too busy. It's like he doesn't even want to see me...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "So I've been wondering if everyone is upset with me because I've been delaying our mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'You can be honest with me, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I know I have a lot of room for improvement. I need to try harder and learn more.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I really like everyone in Gray Raven. So, I'm afraid of losing you all...", 4: '1'}
{2: "I think it's best to speak with the others directly.", 3: '50'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...Also. I have something else I wanted to ask of you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I hope you continue to keep an eye on me. I want you to give me guidance whenever I make a mistake, so I can show you that I'm getting stronger.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Okay... Thank you, Commandant, for finding some time in your busy schedule to speak with me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv, see the buildings around us?', 3: '60', 4: "Why don't we go for a walk to clear your mind?", 5: '60'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Huh? Um, yeah... The architecture is really different here. I hadn't really noticed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...But there are still Corrupted roaming around...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I can relax with you by my side.', 3: '65'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'And... with you here... I can relax, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Impromptu Adventure Team, move out!', 3: '69', 4: 'Late night adventure time!', 5: '69'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Are you ready yet over there, Lee?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We've hit a snag. Who came up with using White Kuroro as a contingency plan?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Super-duper cute Nanami! That's who! Since it SOMEHOW isn't snowing in December, how else are we gonna create such beautiful snow? The plan's perfect!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Just a few minor issues. Nothing that'll get in my way. The snow will fall right on cue."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh, hey! Didn't you ask Karenina for help, too?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I wanna go play with Karenina. I'm bored here. I wanna see if there's anything new and exciting going on over there!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '(Sighs) Finally, I can work in peace.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hey! You guys! Don't pass your problems off to me—!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Someone as tiny as Nanami should be easy to take care of with your long-ranged arsenal, right?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Dang it...! You little—! Fine... I'll think of a way to get out of this mess...!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Karenina! Karenina! Your favorite lil' Nanami is here to play!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "How'd you get here so fast?! Lucia, I gotta terminate the call. I'll contact you when I'm up to bat—", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "...Well, Lee, the commandant is near the scheduled location. It's your time to shine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Roger. Time to turn this place into a winter wonderland with some Kuroro Cog snow. In a sense, I guess it really does need to shine.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I will relay the sit rep in each area. Hurry up.', 4: '1'}
